Title: Black Souls
Writer: Gioacchino Criaco (novel), Francesco Munzi (screenplay), Maurizio Braucci (screenplay), Fabrizio Ruggirello (screenplay)
Actors: Marco Leonardi, Peppino Mazzotta, Fabrizio Ferracane, Barbora Bobulova
Plot: The story of three brothers, the sons of a shepherd, close to the ndrangheta and of their divided soul.
